page.title: 18THE VICAR & CHURCH LANGTOFT
page.content: The church was built of limestone in the 12 hundreds.The vicar is fairly new.He has four churches,they are Langtoft,Baston,Wilsthorpe and Braceborough.In langtoft they have about 7 weddings and 5 funerals and 5 christanings a year.On a Sunday the reverend John Duckett has to do four services,first he does a service at Langtoft for an hour then he goes home for a little time then he goes over to Baston then at 12 o'clock he goes home for lunch he has a rest then goes over to Wilsthorpe for a service at Braceborough.He has a very long day on a Sunday.The church was built because people want to pray in a civilized manner,in a beautiful building dedicated to God. by James Denniston.
